title: Koorie culture, Koorie control
creator_credit: Russell Porter, Lucy MacLaren, Museum Victoria, Film Victoria and Mozo Films
brief_description: Through a series of interviews with members of Victorian First Nations communities, this video gives a broad understanding of the unwritten and undocumented history of Victoria. Issues such as the protection of sites of significance, the return of skeletal remains to their home and the significance of passing on Koorie culture to the young are all raised in this program, which stresses the importance of First Nations peoples’ land rights.
